update SAM_TASK_REQUESTS
TASK_REQUEST_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_REQUEST_ID = #{record.parentRequestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_RUNNER_ID = #{record.taskRunnerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
